title: Hacker
body: I think i encounterd my first hacker since season 1. He picked graves and had no cd on his e and just destroyed us before 15 minutes. My question is do we receive our lp back ? :D because this is just absurd. i have video evidence of him hacking if that helps.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, LP cannot be modified once the server records a gain or loss. The system is designed this way so it cannot be abused. In this situation, the best action to take is to report the suspected player and provide as many details as possible. In this way, you help us prioritize who we look at. 

Cheaters really stink, especially if they're in ranked games trying to ruin other's games. I encourage you to continue reporting those who are not upholding the competitive spirit and are cheating so that we can ensure the playing field is even for everyone.

Let me know if you have any questions.

not really then no, how is it possible tho? to still have hackers in league?
